headline: Moody's lifts Kroger outlook to stable, affirms Baa1 rating
summary: Investing.com -- On Thursday, Moody's Ratings announced an update on Kroger Company's (NYSE:KR) financial outlook, shifting it to stable from the previously negative stance. Concurrently, the firm maintained Kroger's Baa1 rating for senior unsecured notes and upheld its Prime-2 rating for the supermarket giant's backed commercial paper program.

headline: Pardon the Disruption: Kroger and Albertsons court filings detail epic power struggle over failed merger
summary: Reviewing both suits reveals the two companies fought fiercely over the divestiture deal and stopped cooperating long before they set foot in court.
